docs.text:
Introduction
#


This is automatically generated 
specification of robot parts
 for the latest version of Scriptbots ARENA mobile game.


Scriptbots ARENA
 is the Android Game about building and programming battle bots in event driven environment. Player creates unique AI by using user friendly interface to win in the online leagues or single player scenarios.


Educational value
#




Improving abstract thinking,


Helps to learn basics of programming and it's much more than just creating sequences. It introduces also parallel operations and communication aspects in reactive model,


Introduces robotics world.




General game features
#




Build custom vehicles (bots). Use unique slots system to plug in parts from different categories,


Parts have different characteristics and functions (may be light or heavy, consume battery in a different way) which affects your bot's speed and lifetime,


Create bots logic in unique visual editor,


Build your Playground. Use arena builder to create your own training field and test your bot's logic and behavior,


Group your bots into teams where each bot is independent but also can cooperate with the rest by using dedicated communication parts (radio),


Watch how your smarter, independent bots destroys enemies,


Challenge other players bots and win online leagues,


Sync data between devices.




Logic builder features
#




Touchable interface and fluent logic creation (no code - it's not only for programmers),


Event driven (reactive behavior). Your bots behavior is based on events (Something happens - 
Event
.. my bot is doing this or that - 
Actions
). Events are mainly generated by installed bot's parts (
system started
 event generated by Frames, 
low battery
 event generated by Batteries, 
object detected
 event generated by distance sensor, etc...),


Loops to repeat couple of times the same block of actions,


Conditions (If.. Then .. Otherwise..),


Background/Parrarel - It's possible to run Action in background so it means that your bot can drive forward, shoot, and scan battlefield for enemies in the same time.


Create non-deterministic logic. If you install Random Number Generator part, your bot can do some operations randomly with specified probability (sometimes turn left.. sometimes turn right), so the behavior it's harder to predict.




Links
#


Google Play


Facebook - fb.me/scriptbotsarena


Contact
#


Any feedback, enhancement ideas, bugs etc. you can send to my mailbox:

no_spam



var obj = { a:'p', b:'szyller', c:'gmail', d:'com' }
document.getElementById('m').innerText = obj.a+obj.b+'@'+obj.c+'.'+obj.d;

Scriptbots ARENA  is the Android Game about building and programming battle bots in event driven environment. Player creates unique AI by using user friendly interface to win in the online leagues or single player scenarios.

Your bots behavior is based on events (Something happens -  Event .. my bot is doing this or that -  Actions ). Events are mainly generated by installed bot's parts ( system started  event generated by Frames,  low battery  event generated by Batteries,  object detected  event generated by distance sensor, etc...),  Loops to repeat couple of times the same block of actions,  Conditions (If.. If you install Random Number Generator part, your bot can do some operations randomly with specified probability (sometimes turn left.. sometimes turn right), so the behavior it's harder to predict.

docs.text:
Battery > 
Battery B-201 V
#






Description
#


One of the most important parts of a bot. Brings additional energy units but it's also quite heavy and make a bot slower.




Characteristics
#








Name


Value










MinRank


1






Price


100f,300f,500f,1000f,






MaxNumber


3






Weight


250f






Battery


2500








Actions
#


Events
#




[Battery level is low]
#


Event is triggered if battery level drops to 25%,  15%, 5%




InputParams
#


Slots
#

docs.text:
Battery > 
Battery Charger
#






Description
#


Invaluable part of the bot. Allows to recharge batteries to the given level. That part can save your bot, but also has one disadventage. Your bot's operating system must be suspended during charging process so it can not perform any actions.




Characteristics
#








Name


Value










MinRank


5






Price


500f,1000f,2000f,3000f,






MaxNumber


3






Weight


250f








Actions
#




[
Charge
]
#


Description
#


Power consumption
 - 5f
#


Parameters
#








Battery level












Type


Slider






Unit


percent






Max


100f






Min


0






Default


100f






Values










Events
#


Slots
#

Radio
#

code number

docs.text:
Sensors > 
(Under development) Damage Detector
#






Description
#


Detects when and where the bot has been hit. Sends the hit point to the On Hit event which allows to rotate to potencial enemy position.




Characteristics
#








Name


Value










MinRank


4






Price


1000f,






MaxNumber


3






Weight


300f






CoolingTime


5f








Actions
#


Events
#




[On Hit]
#


InputParams
#


Slots
#

docs.text:
Shield > 
Force Field Generator
#






Description
#


Generates force field around your bot and protects it from cannon bullets. You can specify the percentage of the current battery level that will be transfered to the shield.




Characteristics
#








Name


Value










MinRank


4






Price


300f,700f,1200f,1800f,






MaxNumber


3






Weight


250f








Actions
#




[
Activate Force Field Generator
]
#


Description
#


Power consumption
 - 5f
#


Parameters
#








Battery to Shield












Type


Slider






Unit


Percent of Battery






Max


100f






Min


1f






Default


20f






Values










Events
#


Slots
#

docs.text:
System > 
Coin Thrower
#






Description
#


The most useless part of your bot. Additional electronic protection which allows to start the bot only if you insert a special BootCoin. It's possible to remove that junk part for a symbolic fee and give your bot unlimited number of free starts




Characteristics
#








Name


Value










Actions
#


Events
#


Slots
#

Weapon > 
Laser Cannon
#






Description
#


Powerful weapon. Uses battery as an ammo so it's potentialy unlimited number of shots. You can also regulate the energy that will be used for shot (more energy implies more damage)




Characteristics
#








Name


Value










MinRank


4






Price


300f,700f,1000f,2000f,






MaxNumber


3






Weight


250f






CoolingTime


2f








Actions
#




[
Fire
]
#


Description
#


Power consumption is multiplied by 1-100




Power consumption
 - 220f

#








Run in backround












Type


Bool






Unit








Max


0






Min


0






Default


0

Type


Slider






Unit


percent






Max

0






Default


100f






Values

Type


Slider






Unit


time(s)

20f






Min


1f






Default


1f






Values










Events
#


Slots
#
